entries.message: An outage or maintenance window is affecting a subset of users in this region. Detailed outage information is available in the customer portal if this event is impacting your resources.

This was due to an issue with one of our uplink providers (NTT).  Our network team modified the routes accordingly to mitigate the problem.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.
We are currently experiencing a network outage at our Tokyo location.  Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Chicago location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2021-01-22 09:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2021-01-22 13:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Chicago instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
